awd_titl_txt: Mathematical Sciences: The Induction Exponent e of an       Infinite Discrete Group
awd_abstract_narration: This project is concerned with virtual Hattori-Stallings                   rank functions from a group G to a normal domain.  It will be                   shown that such a function is a sum of inductions from finite                   hyperelementary subgroups of G.  This will extend the known                     situation for linear groups.                                                         The research is concerned with applications of higher K-                   theory to concrete problems about group rings.  If the main                     result is established, it will imply Bass' Strong conjecture and                will show that the statements of the Goldie rank conjecture and                 zero divisor conjecture hold for all Goldie group rings in                      charateristic zero.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
